features: Fixed suspension favors both stability and comfort with moisture-wicking padded backpack straps, back panel and hip belt
Traditional suitcase style butterfly opening offers two distinct large compartments for optimal organization
Mesh main compartments allow you to see your contents at a glance
Padded 17’'laptop sleeve at the back of the main compartment
Two zippered front panel pockets are perfect for fast storage, and include interior mesh slip pockets, a padded electronic pocket, a key fob and a pen slot
Self-repairing lockable zippers with easy grip zipper pulls are engineered to withstand the efforts of even the most confident over-packers
Loop the top lockable zippers through the Central Lock Point to guarantee that your bag cannot be accessed by anyone without the code
Bottom shoe compartment seals off the dirt and moisture of your footwear, while leaving the rest of your travel wardrobe unscathed
Adjustable load lifter straps and side compression straps allow you to stabilize the pack and achieve optimal fit
Sternum strap includes a safety whistle
Front mesh stuffer pocket with secured bouldering hook offers a quick place to store garments that need drying such as a raincoat or a bathing suit
Mesh side pockets offer easy access to water bottles, tripods, flashlights and other quick essentials
Compression straps along the bag securely hold jackets, foldable hats, towels and other gear attachments
Durable Bi-Tech fabric bottom is abrasion and weather resistant so you don’t have to worry about accidentally putting your pack down in that massive puddle outside the airport

Top, bottom and side haul handles make it easier to lift and tuck the bag away whether it’s being thrown in an overhead bin as a carry-on, on the luggage hauler for checked baggage or even just tossed into storage under your bed
Includes a tuck-away rainfly in the bottom stuff pocket to further protect the weatherproofed fabric when a light rain becomes torrential down-pour
This indestructible bag is still covered by our No Matter What Warranty
